news.title: Powell Triggers Market Carnage: VIX Spikes 58%, Stocks Plummet, Dollar Hits 2-Year Highs, Bitcoin Nosedives - Amazon.com  ( NASDAQ:AMZN )
news.content: Powell's hawkish tone sparks market rout, sending the Dow down 1,123 points and the S&P 500 tumbling 2.9%. The U.S. dollar surges to two-year highs, while Bitcoin falls 5.5% and gold drops 2.1% amid risk-off sentiment.
